Name: JUST BAT (VR CRICKET)
About the game: JUST BAT is a revolutionary new VR CRICKET game that allows you to master the art of batting. An innovative new control system allows unrivalled control of shots in any style and direction. Set high scores and compete with others around the world. Features Include: - Spin and Fast Bowling - Ball Speed Control - Ball Line and Length Control - Helmet View - Feedback on Bat-Ball Collision Position - Force Feedback - Two Game Modes: 5 Over Challenge and Free Play - A Global Leader Board for the 5 Over Challenge - AI Fielders - Pick Gaps and Score Runs - Bowler Animation - Full Freedom with Shot Selection - Separate Field Settings and Bowling Configurations for Left and Right Hand Batsmen
